forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 11C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers, a few thundershowers and gusty winds during the evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thundershowers in the evening...overcast overnight with occasional rain likely. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 58F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High near 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 13C. S winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. S winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High around 60F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 60F. ESE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
